txt.en:
'What's that? They have need of more stone-masons at Zigil-jabâl? It seems every week they ask for more!'

Nár shakes his head, and his face is suddenly mournful.

'There are few enough stone-masons here to repair our own hold. I cannot remember the last time I saw one. The last time...'

Nár's brow furrows in thought and he speaks no more.
